BeamTimeSeries 
 TimeSeries BeamTimeSeries(int num_waveforms,
                           CPlotData **cd_list,
                           double *t_lag,

Return a beamed waveform. Beam the input waveforms using the input time lags and weights. The beamed waveform will be in counts.
